headerDisplay: [homebridge-myq2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2) is a Homebridge plugin to interact with MyQ Smart Garage door openers, made primarily by LiftMaster and Chamberlain.
footerDisplay: For additional help please see the [homebridge-myq2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2) Github page.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name you would like to assign to this MyQ Home Bridge. Default: MyQ2

email.title: MyQ Username
email.description: Email address used for your MyQ account.

password.title: MyQ Password
password.description: Password used for your MyQ account.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Logging verbosity for debugging purporses. Default: false

openDuration.title: Open Duration
openDuration.description: Time in seconds to check that the garage door has finished opening. Default: 15

closeDuration.title: Close Duration
closeDuration.description: Time in seconds to check that the garage door has finished closing. Default: 25

shortPoll.title: Short Poll Interval
shortPoll.description: Polling interval in seconds to use when the door state changes. Default: 5

shortPollDuration.title: Short Poll Duration
shortPollDuration.description: Duration in seconds to use the Short Poll Interval. Default: 600

layout.title: Advanced Settings (Optional)
layout.help: Configure advanced features such as debugging.

items.description: Add gateway IDs, one per entry. This is only needed in the circumstance where you have more than one MyQ gateway and wish to limit which MyQ gateways are used by this plugin.
Add opener IDs, one per entry. This is only needed in the circumstance where you have more than one opener associated with a MyQ gateway and you wish to limit which openers are used by this plugin.
